item.title: Playing for Fun 8: Stardew Valley
item.description: Wake up. Water plants. Harvest crops. Sell crops. Collect eggs. Make mayonnaise. Milk the cows. Mine some copper. Smelt copper bar. Go to blacksmith. Open geode. Donate to museum. Give a gift to Abigail. Go fishing. Go out to the pub. Talk to some friends. Walk home. Go to bed. Do it all again tomorrow.

item.itunes:author: Myke Hurley and Tiffany Arment
item.itunes:subtitle: Wake up. Water plants. Harvest crops. Sell crops. Collect eggs. Milk the cows. Mine some copper. Go to blacksmith. Open geode. Give a gift to Abigail. Go fishing. Go out to the pub. Talk to some friends. Walk home. Go to bed. Do it all again tomorrow.

Give a gift to Abigail. Go fishing. Go out to the pub. Talk to some friends. Walk home. Go to bed. Do it all again tomorrow.
